name: Citi<sup>®</sup> Diamond Preferred<sup>®</sup> Card
offeringHeading: 24/7 access to concierge service for booking hotels, flights and more.

details.title: Card Benefits
details.description: 24/7 concierge service for help booking hotels, flights, concert tickets and much more. Register your covered purchases with Citi® Price Rewind and it will search for a lower price on retailers' sites. Learn more at citi.com/pricerewind.

details.title: Annual fee
details.description: No annual fee.<sup>1</sup>

details.title: APR
details.description: 0% Intro APR for 18 months on balance transfers and purchases. After that, the variable APR will be 11.99% - 21.99%, based on your creditworthiness. A balance transfer fee of 3% of the amount of each transfer will be applied, $5 minimum.

name: Citi Simplicity<sup>®</sup> Card
offeringHeading:
No late fees – ever.
No penalty rate – ever.
No annual fee – ever.

details.title: Card Benefits
details.description: No late fees, no penalty rate and no annual fee - ever.<sup>1</sup> Plus our lowest intro APR for 18 months on purchases and balance transfers. Get fast, personal help, 24 hours a day.

details.title: Annual fee
details.description: No annual fee.<sup>1</sup>

details.title: APR
details.description: 0% Intro APR on purchases and balance transfers for 18 months; after that the variable APR will be 12.99% - 21.99%, based on your creditworthiness.<sup>1</sup> A balance transfer fee of 3% of the amount of each transfer will be applied, $5 minimum.<sup>2</sup>

name: Citi<sup>®</sup> Double Cash Card
offeringSubheading: 1% when you buy and 1% as you pay.

details.title: Card Benefits
details.description: The only card that lets you earn unlimited cash back twice with 1% on purchases and 1% as you pay for those purchases in full or over time. No caps and no category restrictions. No Enrollments in Rotating Categories. Balance transfer fee either $5 or 3% fee of the amount of each balance transfer, whichever is greater.<sup>1</sup>

details.title: Annual fee
details.description: No annual fee.

details.title: APR
details.description: 0% Intro APR on purchases & balance transfers for 15 months; after that the variable APR will be 12.99% - 22.99%, based on your creditworthiness.

name: Citi<sup>®</sup> ThankYou<sup>®</sup> Preferred Card
offeringSubheading: After you spend $1,500 in 3 months. Plus, no annual fee!

details.title: Card Benefits
details.description: Earn 20,000 Bonus ThankYou<sup>®</sup> Points after you spend $1,500 in purchases within 3 months of account opening - redeemable for $200 in gift cards.<sup>1</sup> 2 ThankYou<sup>®</sup> Points per dollar spent on purchases for dining at restaurants and entertainment.<sup>1</sup> 1 ThankYou® Point per $1 spent on other purchases.<sup>2</sup> Points do not expire and earn unlimited ThankYou<sup>®</sup> Points.<sup>2</sup> Exclusive events for ThankYou Cardmembers. Balance transfer fee either $5 or 3% fee of the amount of each balance transfer, whichever is greater.<sup>2</sup>

details.title: Annual fee
details.description: No annual fee.

details.title: APR
details.description: 0% Intro APR on purchases & balance transfers for 12 months; after that the variable APR will be 12.99% - 22.99%, based on your creditworthiness.

name: Citi<sup>®</sup> / AAdvantage<sup>®</sup> Platinum Select<sup>®</sup> MasterCard<sup>®</sup>
offeringHeading: Earn 50,000 American Airline AAdvantage<sup>®</sup> Bonus Miles<sup>1</sup>

details.title: Card Benefits
details.description: Earn 50,000 American Airlines AAdvantage<sup>®</sup> bonus miles and 2 Admirals Club<sup>®</sup> One–Day Passes after making $3,000 in purchases within the first 3 months of cardmembership.

elements: Your first checked bag is free for you and up to four travel companions.<sup>2</sup>
Enjoy Group 1 Boarding, and use the extra time to prepare for your flight.<sup>2</sup>

You earn 2 AAdvantage<sup>®</sup> miles for every $1 spent on eligible American Airlines purchases, including US Airways codeshare flights booked through American Airlines<sup>3</sup>. Plus, earn 1 AAdvantage<sup>®</sup> mile per $1 spent on other purchases.
Receive 25% savings on in-flight food and beverage purchases when you use your card on American Airlines flights.<sup>2</sup>

lists.heading: Additional Citi<sup>®</sup> Platinum Select<sup>®</sup> / AAdvantage<sup>®</sup> World MasterCard<sup>®</sup> benefits:
elements: Earn 10% of your redeemed AAdvantage<sup>®</sup> miles back – up to 10,000 AAdvantage<sup>®</sup> miles each calendar year.
Earn a $100 American Airlines Flight Discount each year of cardmembership in which you spend $30,000 or more in purchases and renew your cardmembership.
Travel with ease and enjoy global acceptance with your Citi chip credit card.

details.title: Annual Fee
details.description: $95 (Fee waived for the first 12 months).<sup>1</sup>

details.title: APR
details.description: 13.99% - 21.99% variable APR based on your creditworthiness.<sup>1</sup>

name: CitiBusiness<sup>®</sup> / AAdvantage<sup>®</sup> Platinum Select<sup>®</sup> World MasterCard<sup>®</sup>
offeringHeading: Earn 50,000 American Airline AAdvantage<sup>®</sup> Bonus Miles

details.title: Card Benefits
details.description: Earn 50,000 American Airlines AAdvantage<sup>®</sup> bonus miles and 2 Admirals Club<sup>®</sup> One–Day Passes after making $3,000 in purchases within the first 3 months of cardmembership.

elements: Get the first checked bag free for you and up to four travel companions.†
Enjoy Group 1 Boarding and use the extra time to prepare for your flight.<sup>1</sup>

You earn 2 AAdvantage<sup>®</sup> miles for every $1 spent on eligible American Airlines purchases, including US Airways codeshare flights booked through American Airlines<sup>3</sup>, and on purchases at certain office supply, telecommunications and car rental merchants. Plus, earn 1 AAdvantage<sup>®</sup> mile per $1 spent on other purchases.
Receive 25% savings on in-flight food and beverage purchases when you use your card on American Airlines flights.<sup>2</sup>

lists.heading: Additional CitiBusiness<sup>®</sup> / AAdvantage<sup>®</sup> World MasterCard<sup>®</sup> benefits:
elements: Renew your annual cardmembership and earn a 5% AAdvantage<sup>®</sup> mileage bonus based upon eligible purchases made during the cardmembership year.

Earn an American Airlines Companion Certificate for domestic main cabin travel after you spend $30,000 or more in purchases each cardmembership year and cardmembership is renewed. Redeeming the certificate costs $99 for the ticketing fee plus $21.60 to $43.20 in government taxes and fees based on itinerary.

details.title: Annual Fee
details.description: $95, waived for the first 12 months.<sup>1</sup>

details.title: APR
details.description: 13.99% - 22.99% variable APR based on your creditworthiness.<sup>1</sup>

name: Citi ThankYou<sup>®</sup> Premier Card
offeringHeading: Earn Up to 20,000 Bonus ThankYou<sup>®</sup> Points
offeringSubheading: After you spend $2,000 in 3 months – with the possibility for more.

details.title: Card Benefits
details.description: Earn 20,000 points after $2,000 in purchases within the first 3 months of account opening, earn 30,000 points after another $3,000 in purchases within the first 3 months of your second year of being a cardmember. 50,000 bonus points are redeemable for up to $500 in gift cards, up to $625 for airfare or other great rewards.<sup>2</sup>

elements: 3x ThankYou Points on Dining out and Entertainment.<sup>2</sup>
2x ThankYou Points on Airfare, Hotels and Travel Agencies.<sup>2</sup>
1x ThankYou Points on other purchases.<sup>1</sup>
No foreign transaction fees on purchases<sup>1</sup>

details.title: APR
details.description: 13.99% - 22.99% variable APR based on your creditworthiness.<sup>1</sup>

details.title: Card Benefits
details.description: Earn 40,000 Hilton HHonors Bonus Points after making $1,000 in purchases within the first 4 months of account opening<sup>1</sup>

elements: 6 HHonors Bonus Points for every $1 spent on hotel stays within the Hilton HHonors portfolio.<sup>1,2</sup>
3 HHonors Bonus Points for every $1 spent at supermarkets, drugstores, and gas stations.<sup>1,3</sup>
2 HHonors Bonus Points for every $1 spent on other purchases.<sup>1</sup>
HHonors Silver status with fast-track to HHonors Gold status after 4 stays within your first 90 days of cardmembership.
Visa Signature<sup>®</sup> Benefits, including concierge service.

details.description: No Annual Fee.1<sup>1</sup>

details.title: Card Benefits
details.description: Earn 30,000 bonus ThankYou<sup>®</sup> Points, plus enjoy superior rewards, service and travel benefits after making $3,000 in purchases within the first 3 months of cardmembership.

elements: Earn 3 ThankYou Points per $1 spent on Air Travel and Hotels.
Earn 2 ThankYou Points on Dining at Restaurants and Entertainment.
Earn 1 ThankYou® Point per $1 spent on other purchases.

Enjoy a $250 air travel credit each year, complimentary access to American Airlines Admirals Club® lounges, plus hundreds of VIP lounges through Priority Pass<sup>TM</sup> Select, and an annual worldwide 4<sup>th</sup> night stay at any hotel property.
No foreign transaction fees on purchases.
Assistance from the global Citi Prestige Concierge team.
